tasks.label: RViz: Robot Model Display
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source /usr/share/gazebo-11/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && export GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH=$(ros2 pkg prefix gazebo_ros2_control)/lib:$GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH && export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=$(ros2 pkg prefix mecanumrover_description)/share:$(ros2 pkg prefix rover_description)/share:/usr/share/gazebo-11:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH && ros2 launch rover_description robot_state_publisher.launch.py > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Clean Build Workspace
tasks.detail: Clean build the entire ROS 2 workspace

tasks.label: Gazebo: Simulation Launch
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source /usr/share/gazebo-11/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && export GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH=$(ros2 pkg prefix gazebo_ros)/lib:$(ros2 pkg prefix gazebo_ros2_control)/lib:$GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH && export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=$(ros2 pkg prefix mecanumrover_description)/share:$(ros2 pkg prefix rover_description)/share:/usr/share/gazebo-11:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH && export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=$(ros2 pkg prefix mecanumrover_description)/share:$(ros2 pkg prefix rover_description)/share:$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH && ros2 launch rover_gazebo gazebo_sim.launch.py > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Hardware: Bringup Rover (Full)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_bringup hardware_bringup.launch.py
tasks.detail: Launch hardware drivers for Vstone base and Livox LiDAR

tasks.label: Hardware: Vstone Only
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_bringup vstone_base.launch.py
tasks.detail: Launch only Vstone base hardware (no LiDAR)

tasks.label: Teleop: Keyboard Control
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 run teleop_twist_keyboard teleop_twist_keyboard --ros-args -r cmd_vel:=rover_twist
tasks.detail: Control rover with keyboard (requires hardware bringup)

tasks.label: Teleop: Mouse Control
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch fwdsrover_xna_bringup mouse_teleop.launch.py
tasks.detail: Control rover with mouse (requires hardware bringup)
